attributes.action: Any future  deal with the European Union should involve free movement of people.
attributes.additional_details:
1.2 million Brits live in the EU.
EU migrants contribute £1.34 for ever £1 they take.
Migrants are a net contributer of £25 billion.
EU migrants contributed £4 billion between 1995 and 2011. And this rate of contribution increases every year.
attributes.background: By coming of the EU out we have secured democratic control but we must seek to protect a progressive multicultural society. Immigration has never been a bad thing for this country. We must continue to seek international integration and cooperation by protecting free movement of people.
